content: MDB Masonry drill bit Masonry drill bit for drilling holes primarily in masonry ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Concrete and masonry drill bits- - - ### FEATURES:Features High performance and long lifetime when drilling into various masonry materials Ideal for drilling and hammer drilling with Hilti cordless drill drivers Applications Drilling in bricks, wood, tiles, plastic and gypsum ### TECHNICAL DATA: Connection end: Cylindrical Base material: Masonry, Drywall, Light-weight concrete Working mode: Hammer drilling, Drilling only Technical Data | Connection end | Cylindrical | Base material | Masonry, Drywall, Light-weight concrete | Working mode | Hammer drilling, Drilling only ### ITEMS- 61483 -
